content: hopemade simple squish hat by hope vasseur yarn one skein of hopemade yarn co squish 100% superwash merino wool 109yards/100g or other bulky/ chunky weight wool yarn sample knit in autumn sunset pom poms may be added but may require additional yarn needles one us # 9 5 5 mm 16 circular needle or two sizes smaller than needle used for body of hat based on gauge one us # 10 5 6 5mm 16 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge one set us # 10 5 6 5mm double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge you can also use 40 circulars and use the magic loop technique notions tapestry needle for weaving in ends one stitch marker for marking start of round gauge 14 stitches/4 inches 10cm in stockinette stitch on larger needles size adult medium finished size 20 50 8cm in circumference skills needed long tail cast-on knitting and purling in the round using double pointed needles or magic loop knit two together binding off weaving in ends abbreviations co cast-on k knit p purl k2tog knit two stitches together begin using smaller needles co 64 stitches using the long-tail cast on join for working in the round placing a marker to indicate the start of the round be careful not to twist your stitches on the first round ribbing *k1 p1 repeat from * to end for 1 5 3 8cm body switch to larger needles knit every round until piece measures approximately 8 20 3 cm from cast-on edge if you would prefer a slouchy hat add more length here crown round 1 *k6 k2tog repeat from * to end knit round 2 *k5 k2tog repeat from * to end round 3 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end round 4 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to end round 5 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end round 6 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end round 7 *k2tog repeat from * to end finish cut yarn leaving at least a 6 tail pull yarn through remaining stitches to cinch top of hat closed secure top of hat weave in ends on inside of hat add a pom pom if desired www hopemadeyarn com hopemadeyarnco@gmail com follow me @hopemadeyarnco on instagram / facebook
